InstructionData.Title: Waste-Coolant Balancer
InstructionData.Author: Renrek
InstructionData.Instructions:
define TOKELVIN 273.15 define ON 1 define OFF 0
alias airCon d0 alias dial d1 alias coolant d2 alias waste d3
alias targetTemp r0 alias outsideTemp r1 alias coolantTemp r2 alias wasteTemp r3 alias onStatus r4
main: jal checkSensors bltal wasteTemp targetTemp startAC bgtal wasteTemp targetTemp stopAC j main
checkSensors: l targetTemp dial Setting add targetTemp targetTemp TOKELVIN l coolantTemp coolant Temperature l wasteTemp waste Temperature j ra
startAC: s airCon Open ON j ra
stopAC: s airCon Open OFF j ra
